Sentencas: A new reactive force field to describe proton diffusion within the solid oxide fuel cell material BaZrO3 has been derived.
Titulo: Reactive force field simulation of proton diffusion in BaZrO3 using an empirical valence bond approach

Sentencas: Using a quantum mechanical potential energy surface, the parameters of an interatomic potential model to describe hydroxyl groups within both pure and yttrium-doped BaZrO3 have been determined.
Titulo: Reactive force field simulation of proton diffusion in BaZrO3 using an empirical valence bond approach

Sentencas: Reactivity is then incorporated through the use of the empirical valence bond model.
Titulo: Reactive force field simulation of proton diffusion in BaZrO3 using an empirical valence bond approach

Sentencas: Molecular dynamics simulations (EVB-MD) have been performed to explore the diffusion of hydrogen using a stochastic thermostat and barostat whose equations are extended to the isostress-isothermal ensemble.
Titulo: Reactive force field simulation of proton diffusion in BaZrO3 using an empirical valence bond approach

Sentencas: In the low concentration limit, the presence of yttrium is found not to significantly influence the diffusivity of hydrogen, despite the proton having a longer residence time at oxygen adjacent to the dopant.
Titulo: Reactive force field simulation of proton diffusion in BaZrO3 using an empirical valence bond approach

Sentencas: This lack of influence is due to the fact that trapping occurs infrequently, even when the proton diffuses through octahedra adjacent to the dopant.
Titulo: Reactive force field simulation of proton diffusion in BaZrO3 using an empirical valence bond approach

Sentencas: The activation energy for diffusion is found to be 0.42 eV, in good agreement with experimental values, though the prefactor is slightly underestimated.
Titulo: Reactive force field simulation of proton diffusion in BaZrO3 using an empirical valence bond approach
